docs.title: Jonas Pangerl
docs.text: CFD Engineer in Formula 1 at Audi F1 Team. Previously 3 years at Williams Racing working as an Aerodynamicist in aero development. Before that, 4 years in Formula Student focusing on Aerodynamics.

docs.title: About this site
docs.text: This is my personal website to share resources, notes, and tools, mainly for the Formula Student community. I’ll post talk materials, small utilities, and pointers that might help teams with their aero and CFD workflows.

docs.title: What you’ll find here
docs.text:
• Talks & Presentations I’ll upload slide decks and supporting material here so you can download them easily after events.

  • Tools & Utilities I wrote a small 2D boundary-layer mesh helper for CFD: it computes BL setup parameters and visualizes them so you can plug them into your meshing workflow.

  • Quick Links & References Links I frequently share with students and colleagues.

docs.title: Downloads
docs.text: All files are listed on the downloads page. Go to Downloads

docs.title: Contact
docs.text:
If you’d like to get in touch, especially regarding Formula Student aero/CFD topics or the BL mesh tool, feel free to reach out on LinkedIn:

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/jonas-pangerl-77045a142/
